languages.text: "Известных мне — нет, но ордена {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестринства{/g} многочисленны и могут действовать независимо друг от друга, направляя сестер туда, где {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархия{/g} видит в них нужду. Может быть, где-то в свите {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитора{/g}, да будет путь его благословен, есть мои сестры? Я бы хотела, чтобы это было так — даже один вечер совместных молитв и тренировок принес бы мне радость!"

traits.locale_text: "Известных мне — нет, но ордена {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестринства{/g} многочисленны и могут действовать независимо друг от друга, направляя сестер туда, где {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархия{/g} видит в них нужду. Может быть, где-то в свите {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитора{/g}, да будет путь его благословен, есть мои сестры? Я бы хотела, чтобы это было так — даже один вечер совместных молитв и тренировок принес бы мне радость!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "None that I'm aware of, but the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisterhood{/g}'s orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. Perhaps somewhere in the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}'s retinue, may his path be blessed, my sisters perform their duty as we speak? I wish it were so — even a single evening spent in joint prayer and training would bring me joy!"
languages.original_text: "Известных мне — нет, но ордена {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестринства{/g} многочисленны и могут действовать независимо друг от друга, направляя сестер туда, где {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархия{/g} видит в них нужду. Может быть, где-то в свите {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитора{/g}, да будет путь его благословен, есть мои сестры? Я бы хотела, чтобы это было так — даже один вечер совместных молитв и тренировок принес бы мне радость!"

traits.locale_text: "Nobody who I'm aware of, but the Sisterhood's Orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their Sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the Ecclesiarchy. Perhaps somewhere in the Lord Inquisitor's retinue, may his path be blessed, my sisters perform their duty as we speak? I wish it were so — even a single evening spent in joint prayer and training would bring me joy!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Nobody who I'm aware of, but the Sisterhood's Orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their Sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the Ecclesiarchy. traits.locale_text: "None that I'm aware of, but the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisterhood{/g}'s orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. Perhaps somewhere in the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}'s retinue, may his path be blessed, my sisters perform their duty as we speak? I wish it were so — even a single evening spent in joint prayer and training would bring me joy!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “据我所知没有，但{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}有很多修会，每个修会都可以独立运作，将她们的修女送到{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}认为该去的地方。或许我的姐妹们此刻正在{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}大审判官{/g}身边履行她们的职责？愿神皇祝福她们的道路。我希望会是这样，如果能与她们一起祈祷、一起训练，哪怕只有一个晚上的时间，也会令我快乐无比！”
languages.original_text: "None that I'm aware of, but the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisterhood{/g}'s orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. Perhaps somewhere in the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}'s retinue, may his path be blessed, my sisters perform their duty as we speak? I wish it were so — even a single evening spent in joint prayer and training would bring me joy!"

traits.locale_text: “据我所知没有，但{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}有很多修会，每个修会都可以独立运作，将她们的修女送到{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}认为该去的地方。或许我的姐妹们此刻正在{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判长{/g}身边履行她们的职责？愿神皇祝福她们的道路。我希望会是这样，如果能与她们一起祈祷、一起训练，哪怕只有一个晚上的时间，也会令我快乐无比！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "None that I'm aware of, but the Sisterhood's orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the Ecclesiarchy. Perhaps somewhere in the Lord Inquisitor's retinue, may his path be blessed, my sisters perform their duty as we speak? I wish it were so — even a single evening spent in joint prayer and training would bring me joy!"

languages.text: «No que yo sepa, pero la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}hermandad{/g} consta de numerosas órdenes que actúan de forma independiente, enviando a sus hermanas dondequiera que hacen falta según la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g}. Es posible que en el séquito del {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisidor{/g}, que su camino sea bendito, alguna de mis hermanas esté ejerciendo sus funciones. Me alegraría que fuera así. ¡Una sola velada de oración y entrenamiento conjunto me llenaría de júbilo!».
languages.original_text: "None that I'm aware of, but the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisterhood{/g}'s orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. Perhaps somewhere in the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}'s retinue, may his path be blessed, my sisters perform their duty as we speak? I wish it were so — even a single evening spent in joint prayer and training would bring me joy!"

traits.locale_text: «No que yo sepa, pero la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}hermandad{/g} consta de numerosas órdenes que actúan de forma independiente, enviando a sus hermanas dondequiera que hacen falta según la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g}. Es posible que en el séquito del {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisidor{/g}, que su camino sea bendito, alguna de mis hermanas esté ejerciendo sus funciones. Me alegraría que fuera así. ¡Una sola velada de oración y entrenamiento conjunto me llenaría de júbilo!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「私が知っている限りではいない。だが、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道会{/g}の命令は多数あり、互いに独立して活動することができる。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}が必要と判断すれば、どこへだってシスターを派遣することはできる。もしかすると、{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}ロード・インクィジター{/g}の随員の中に、我が姉妹が責務を果たしているかもしれない。その道行きに祝福のあらんことを。そうであればいいのだがな…一晩でも共に祈りと訓練を行えば、私にとっては大きな歓びとなるのだから！」
languages.original_text: "None that I'm aware of, but the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisterhood{/g}'s orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. Perhaps somewhere in the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}'s retinue, may his path be blessed, my sisters perform their duty as we speak? I wish it were so — even a single evening spent in joint prayer and training would bring me joy!"

traits.locale_text: 「私が知っている限りではいない。だが、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道会{/g}の命令は多数あり、互いに独立して活動することができる。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}が必要と判断すれば、どこへだってシスターを派遣することはできる。もしかすると、{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}ロード・インクィジター{/g}の随員の中に、我が姉妹が責務を果たしているかもしれない。その道行きに祝福のあらんことを。そうであればいいのだがな…一晩でも共に祈りと訓練を行えば、私にとっては大きな歓びとなるのだから！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Nicht, dass ich wüsste, doch die Orden der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwesternschaft{/g} sind zahlreich und können unabhängig voneinander agieren. Sie schicken ihre Schwestern dorthin, wo sie nach Ansicht der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} gebraucht werden. Vielleicht führen meine Schwestern just in diesem Moment irgendwo im Gefolge des {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Großinquisitors{/g} ihre Pflicht aus, gepriesen möge sein Pfad sein? Ich wünsche es mir — selbst ein einziger Abend im gemeinsamen Gebet und gemeinsamer Übung würde mir Freude bringen!"
languages.original_text: "None that I'm aware of, but the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisterhood{/g}'s orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. Perhaps somewhere in the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}'s retinue, may his path be blessed, my sisters perform their duty as we speak? I wish it were so — even a single evening spent in joint prayer and training would bring me joy!"

traits.locale_text: "Nicht, dass ich wüsste, doch die Orden der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwesternschaft{/g} sind zahlreich und können unabhängig voneinander agieren. Sie schicken ihre Schwestern dorthin, wo sie nach Ansicht der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} gebraucht werden. Vielleicht führen meine Schwestern just in diesem Moment irgendwo im Gefolge des {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Großinquisitors{/g} ihre Pflicht aus, gepriesen möge sein Pfad sein? Ich wünsche es mir — selbst ein einziger Abend im gemeinsamen Gebet und gemeinsamer Übung würde mir Freude bringen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Pas que je sache, mais la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sororité{/g} compte de nombreux ordres qui peuvent opérer indépendamment les uns des autres et envoyer leurs sœurs partout où leur présence s'avère nécessaire, à la discrétion de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g}. Peut-être qu'au sein de la suite du {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}seigneur inquisiteur{/g}, bénie soit sa route, mes sœurs font-elles leur devoir en ce moment même ? J'aimerais que ce soit le cas. Une seule soirée de prière et d'entraînement communs m'apporterait énormément de joie ! »
languages.original_text: "None that I'm aware of, but the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisterhood{/g}'s orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. Perhaps somewhere in the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}'s retinue, may his path be blessed, my sisters perform their duty as we speak? I wish it were so — even a single evening spent in joint prayer and training would bring me joy!"

traits.locale_text: « Pas que je sache, mais la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sororité{/g} compte de nombreux ordres qui peuvent opérer indépendamment les uns des autres et envoyer leurs sœurs partout où leur présence s'avère nécessaire, à la discrétion de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g}. Peut-être qu'au sein de la suite du {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}seigneur inquisiteur{/g}, bénie soit sa route, mes sœurs font-elles leur devoir en ce moment même ? J'aimerais que ce soit le cas. Une seule soirée de prière et d'entraînement communs m'apporterait énormément de joie ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bildiğim kadarıyla yok. Fakat {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Rahibe Cemaati'nin{/g} birçok kolu vardır ve bunlar, birbirlerinden bağımsız hareket edebilir. Rahibeler; ihtiyaç duyulması hâlinde, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi'nin{/g} uygun gördüğü yerlerde görev yapar. Belki biz burada konuşurken kardeşlerim, {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Engizisyoncu{/g} Hazretleri'nin maiyetinde hizmet veriyordur. Ah... Onlarla bir akşam dua edip talim yapmak beni öyle mesut ederdi ki!"
languages.original_text: "None that I'm aware of, but the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sisterhood{/g}'s orders are many and can operate independently of one another, sending their sisters wherever their presence is needed as deemed by the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. Perhaps somewhere in the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g}'s retinue, may his path be blessed, my sisters perform their duty as we speak? I wish it were so — even a single evening spent in joint prayer and training would bring me joy!"

traits.locale_text: "Bildiğim kadarıyla yok. Fakat {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Rahibe Cemaati{/g}'nin birçok kolu vardır ve bunlar, birbirlerinden bağımsız hareket edebilir. Rahibeler, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g}'nin uygun gördüğü yerlerde ihtiyaç duyuldukları hâlde görev yapar. Kim bilir, belki biz burada konuşuyorken {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Engizisyoncu{/g} Hazretleri'nin maiyetinde hizmet eden kardeşlerim vardır? Ah, onlarla bir akşam dua edip talim yapmak beni öyle mesut ederdi ki!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
